metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27662 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In GLPI before 9.5.3, ajax/comments.php has an Insecure Direct ObjectReference (IDOR) vulnerability that allows an attacker to read data fromany database table (e.g., glpi_tickets, glpi_users, etc.).

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
